import React from 'react'; import images from '../Dashboard/images.jpg'; function List({ employees, handleEdit, handleDelete }) { const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: null, }); const containerStyle = { background: `url(${images})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', opacity: 0., height: '100vh', margin: 0, padding: 0, }; return (
{employees.length > 0 ? ( employees.map((employee, i) => ( )) ) : ( )}
No. First Name Last Name Address Customer Number Meter Serial Number Actions
{i + 1} {employee.firstName} {employee.lastName} {employee.email} {formatter.format(employee.salary)} {employee.date}
No Employees
); } export default List;
